projects.title: Technical Research Project
projects.description: Worked with Dr. Amanpreet Kapoor at the University of Florida (UF) to create Open Education Resources (OER) that will be added to the Data Structures and Algorithms course at UF and distributed globally. I created technical interview questions and recorded content to guide others to a solution and how to solve such problems during the interview process.

projects.title: Content Generator
projects.description: Created a program that generates entertaining video content to be uploaded on video sharing platforms. The program leverages the Reddit API, the Google Text to Speech service, Mutagen, and Moviepy by retrieving posts from reddit, loading subtitles, altering the audio, and rendering the video into several parts.

projects.title: Tic-Tac-Toe AI
projects.description: Created an unbeatable tic-tac-toe bot and learned about AI by implementing the minimax algorithm

projects.title: Maze Generator and Path Finder
projects.description: Creates random mazes of variable length using a depth-first search and compares Dijkstra's algorithm and breadth-first search in terms of time for finding the shortest path between two points in the maze

projects.title: Moodify
projects.description: Recommends users songs based on their current mood via the Spotify API and a heuristic algorithm which outputs how closely a song matches a user's mood.

projects.title: Java Mastermind
projects.description: Created a version of the Mastermind boardgame in Java

projects.title: Car Salesperson Simulator
projects.description: Worked with Java Swing to create a UI for user's to buy cars.

projects.title: Minesweeper
projects.description: Worked with the SFML library and C++ to make a working version of minesweeper.
